page.title: 01SUMMARY OF S.ELKINGTON
page.content: This farming area is one of the most attractive in the county.It abuts on Louth, a wealthy old market town at the eastern edge of the Lincolnshire Wolds.Population about 200.Residential property of 3 types:{ {Large indivdual houses}homes of past and present local landowners.2.{Farm {cottages,houses }and{bungalows} isolated within S.Elkington village. 3.{22 middle class residences}in string development along A631 road.The attraction of the area is mainly due to the wealth and social conscience of local inhabitants and particularly the principal landowner.Local features include parkland,lakes,small tributary of the Lud,woodland,old brickyard, village church,chapel and shop.There is no public house.
